Class StudentMenuView

Object
StudentMenuView
public class StudentMenuView extends Object
view class responsible for handling student-facing system interactions presents menu operations relating to internship browsing, application, acceptance, withdrawal and account maintenance

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final InternshipBrowserView
    browserView
    shared browser interface used to view and filter internships
    private final DateTimeFormatter
    fmt
    formatter for consistent internship date display

    sc
    console scanner for user text input

    studentController
    controller containing student-related business logic

      allow a student to accept a successful internship offer and automatically withdraw all other applications
      Parameters:
